title: 11107 Claude Court -Northglenn - Fox Run - Gorgeous Unit!
posting_body: ['Text', 'show contact info', 'to setup a showing!', 'Virtual tour: 11107 Claude Court', 'AREA: Northglenn', 'FEATURES:', 'New, matching white appliances, new paint, excellent condition!', 'This townhome will rent quick, so set up your showing today!', '"As-is" humidifier system connected to the furnace.', 'TENANT PAID UTILITIES:', 'All utilities paid by tenant.', 'BEDROOMS & BATHROOMS: 3 bedrooms (all upstairs), 2 bathrooms (full bath upstairs, 1/2 bath on the main level).', 'KITCHEN APPLIANCES INCLUDED: Refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, stove, oven, garbage disposal.', 'LAUNDRY: Washer and dryer included!', 'Located on the main level.', 'FLOORING:', 'Beautiful laminate on the main level, carpeting on the stairs and upstairs in the bedrooms.', 'HEAT/COOLING: Central heat and AC!', 'PARKING:', 'Large single car garage attached, street parking available too.', 'FENCING:', 'Fenced backyard (patio and mulched area).', 'BASEMENT: No basement.', 'RESTRICTIONS:', 'Pets considered with a one-time non-refundable pet fee of $250 per pet.', 'Sorry, but we cannot allow any of the following breeds of dog: American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, and Staffordshire Bull Terrier.', 'SECURITY DEPOSIT:', "Security deposit is equal to one month's rent.", 'APPLICATION FEE: $30 per adult.', 'Please note we have a 700 minimum credit score for all properties.', 'AVAILABILITY DATE: Today!', "**Applicants must be able to start a lease within 1 weeks of the property's listed availability date.", '**', 'LEASE TERM: Initial lease to end April through June of 2023 with 12-month extensions possible at that time.', 'Growing marijuana inside or outside the premises is not allowed, smoking of any kind inside the property is not allowed.', 'Minimum 700 credit score required.']
